body:
Hi all, Myv here.

My Skype keeps saying 'sorry, we couldn't connect to Skype'. Now my internet is fine as I am able to write this post, and I was wondering if anyone else has had the same problem. I logged out as I do always when I turn off, so can anyone explain it?

N.B this is the only place I can write it on, sorry for the inconvenience.

Cheers.

Myv

replies.body: Are you on a Mac? I had this same problem a while back, I think I just redownloaded it and restarted my computer

replies.body: happened to my skype but then it corrected itself pretty much instantly - this was on a phone (IOS)

replies.body: Yeah, what they said above. Reboot your computer. If that doesn't work, then you should reinstall it.

replies.body:
I had this too. I changed my password.

If that doesn't work, reinstall Skype.
